import LabelResponseLevel from 'components/LabelResponseLevel'; import React, { useDeferredValue, useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components'; function PostingDetail({ fetchWddDataResult }) { const companyByTag = fetchWddDataResult.postingDetail.read(); const [inViewState, setInView] = useState(false); const ref = useRef(); const fixref = useRef(); const [popupAi, setpopupAi] = useState(false); const inView = useDeferredValue(inViewState); const handleScrollPage = () => { if (fixref.current.getBoundingClientRect().y < window.innerHeight) { setInView(true); } else { setInView(false); } }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScrollPage); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScrollPage); }; }, []); const handleScrollPrev = (type) => { if (type === 'left') { ref.current.scrollBy({ top: 0, left: -1, behavior: 'smooth', }); } else { ref.current.scrollBy({ top: 0, left: 1, behavior: 'smooth', }); } }; return (
